Fine Gold Bar


During Chinese New Year, the pineapple symbolises good fortune, luck and wealth, similar to oranges. It is because in several chinese dialects, it's name is the same meaning as "fortune comes". 


During chinese new year, a pineapple product will always be present in every home that is celebrating.
